Class DelPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Public
      • DelPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DelPanel
extends Public
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This is Group033's Software Engineering Coursework.
    Version:
    4.03 15 May 2016
    Author:
    Group033
    See Also:
    Manager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DelPanel()
      constructor DelPanel This constructor is to create a frame contained twobutton The upper one is to delete the route The lower one is to change the information of the route.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
      method actionPerformed This method is override the actionPerformed method The method indicated all the GUI changes in the delete panel
      void changePanel()
      method changePanel This method is create a GUI and the manage could input the route he or she want to change
      void changeRoute()
      method changeRoute This method is to input the new station number and train number so that the inputPanel can form the timetable
      java.lang.String[] changeTrainDriver(java.lang.String[] train, java.lang.String[] driver, int offset)
      method changeTrainDriver This method is to change the train and driver and return the changed information
      boolean getRoute(java.lang.String route, java.lang.String fileName)
      method getRoute This method is to select the route information which the manager want to delete or change.
      void getTrainDriver()
      method getTrainDriver This method is to get the train and driver in the selected route which is to be changed or deleted It is need at all the opreation in the DelPanel.java
      void inputPanel()
      method inputPanel This method is to select the route information which need to be changed The input value should the new Timetable information
      void remove()
      method remove This method is to remove the selected route from the file So that when get the information and simulation the information can be updated
      void removePanel()
      method removePanel This method is create a GUI and the manage could input the route he or she want to delete
      void removeRoute()
      method removeRoute This method is to remove the selected route from the file and restore the driver and train's status So that when get the information and simulation the information can be updated
      void rmDriver(java.lang.String[] driver)
      method rmDriver This method is to remove the driver which is to restore the driver's status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The drivers' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
      void rmTrain(java.lang.String[] train)
      method rmTrain This method is to remove the train which is to restore the train status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The trains' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
      void updateTimetable()
      method updateTimetable This method is to update the timetable file so the system could read the changed information on time The system is depend on file so this method is to store the changed informaiton back into the file

      • getRoute

        public boolean getRoute(java.lang.String route,
                        java.lang.String fileName)
        method getRoute This method is to select the route information which the manager want to delete or change. Then the file execution will depend on the opreation this step
        Parameters:
        route - The route name that the manager typed in to change or delete
        fileName - The file that stores the information of all routes
        Returns:
        boolean If the route is not exuted, returns false

      • changeTrainDriver

        public java.lang.String[] changeTrainDriver(java.lang.String[] train,
                                            java.lang.String[] driver,
                                            int offset)
        method changeTrainDriver This method is to change the train and driver and return the changed information
        Parameters:
        train - The earlier train information
        driver - The earlier driver information
        offset - The number train and driver need to be changed. Opposite: add, Negative: decrease, Zero: not change
        Returns:
        String[] returns the train and driver's information after changes

      • updateTimetable

        public void updateTimetable()
        method updateTimetable This method is to update the timetable file so the system could read the changed information on time The system is depend on file so this method is to store the changed informaiton back into the file

      • rmTrain

        public void rmTrain(java.lang.String[] train)
        method rmTrain This method is to remove the train which is to restore the train status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The trains' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
        Parameters:
        train - The trains' list which are to be changed

      • rmDriver

        public void rmDriver(java.lang.String[] driver)
        method rmDriver This method is to remove the driver which is to restore the driver's status to "true" when the route changes or be deleted The drivers' information is stored in the file so the operation is to chang the content of the file
        Parameters:
        driver - The drivers' list which are to be changed.
